body.name: Utopia Kitchen Nonstick Frying Pan Set - 3 Piece Induction Bottom - 8 Inches, 9.5 Inches and 11 Inches (Grey-Black)

features: The 3 piece frying pan set includes an 8 inch, 9.5 inch and 11 inch frying pans to fit you and your family’s varying cooking needs.
The induction bottom of the frying pans is suitable for all types of cooking; including electric and ceramic cook tops.
The professional grade aluminum makes the frying pan durable, light-weight and sturdy.
The pans have high quality double coated nonstick interior which allows for easier cooking and cleanup; PFOA, lead and Cadmium-free.
The Bakelite handles are ergonomically designed and riveted strongly to the pan for safety and comfort.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Premium Quality Nonstick Frying Pans Utopia Kitchen presents you with this Premium Quality 3 Piece Nonstick Copper Frying Pans which are one of the most important cookware for home use and food enthusiasts. The design is immensely elegant and modern, which is completely safe to use. Made with high-grade aluminum alloy, featuring a nonstick and durable ceramic coating that helps you in preparing your favorite food with ease, whether it's fish, vegetables, beef, chicken, or numerous other dishes.

Care & Maintenance Instructions Wash the frying pan with hot soapy water and dry it off completely with a soft cotton or linen towel before using it for the first time.In order to protect the nonstick coating, please use plastic or wooden utensils.Always let the frying pan cool before washing it.Unlike standard cookware, nonstick cookware perform better at slightly lower temperatures. Ergonomic Design Our Bakelite handle is ergonomically designed to provide a secure and comfortable grip. The long handle ensures easy maneuvering and mixing of ingredients while preventing any spill offs. Induction Friendly for Easy Cooking The cook wares are designed to make your life easier in the Kitchen. Our nonstick frying pans are multi-layered and induction friendly that provides even heat distribution thereby making it suitable for all types of stovetops; including electric and ceramic cooktops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I may be late to the party, but these are nice to have! Makes washing dishes so much easier! Affordable, looks nice and works great! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good set of non-stick pans.
reviews.reviewText: It was time to replace an aging set of three "Teflon" surfaced frying pans that were exhibiting wear and some food adhesion occurrences. We chose this set for their selection of sizes similar to the ones they have replaced and because of their described attributes. We have found the descriptions to be true and our experience with use has been gratifying. The pans are of good heft and they conduct heat evenly. We are happy with the results obtained when cooking delicate and frequently "sticky" foodstuffs like meats, eggs and cheese. The pans clean up easily and well and they sit on a level surface without rocking. The handles are firmly affixed, they are comfortable to grip, and they do not feel hot to the touch when the pans are heated during use. Note: our range is fueled by gas. These pans purportedly work on electric coil and induction range tops but we are unable to gage their functionality on those heating surfaces. We are, overall, pleased with these pans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good for the value
reviews.reviewText: I like the value, quality, easy to clean and perhaps durability. I bought a similar set a year ago and it lasted for one year. That's why i bought a new set. It was time to replace them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good price and value
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Utopia Kitchen Frying Pan, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in terms of quality and value for money. This culinary gem has quickly become an indispensable tool in my kitchen, and I'm thrilled to share my thoughts on this exceptional product.First and foremost, the price point of the Utopia Kitchen Frying Pan is unbeatable. In a market flooded with high-priced cookware options, this pan offers remarkable value without compromising on performance. Its affordable price makes it accessible to a wide range of home cooks, from beginners to seasoned chefs, looking to elevate their culinary creations without breaking the bank.The craftsmanship of the Utopia Kitchen Frying Pan is truly remarkable. The sturdy construction ensures even heat distribution, resulting in perfectly cooked dishes every time. The non-stick coating is exceptional, making cooking and cleaning an absolute breeze. From searing meats to frying delicate eggs, this pan consistently delivers outstanding results, making it a versatile companion in the kitchen.I also appreciate the thoughtful design elements incorporated into this frying pan. The ergonomic handle provides a comfortable grip, reducing strain during extended cooking sessions. The pan's well-balanced weight adds to its overall ease of use. Furthermore, the inclusion of a heat-resistant handle ensures safety during cooking, offering peace of mind in the hustle and bustle of the kitchen.Durability is another standout feature of the Utopia Kitchen Frying Pan. After several weeks of intense use, it has shown no signs of wear and tear. The robust materials used in its construction inspire confidence in its ability to withstand the test of time, making it a long-lasting investment.Lastly, Utopia Kitchen is known for its excellent customer service, and my experience with them has been nothing short of exceptional. They promptly addressed any queries I had, ensuring a smooth and satisfying purchasing process.In conclusion, the Utopia Kitchen Frying Pan is a phenomenal kitchen essential that provides remarkable value for its price. With its superior craftsmanship, ease of use, and durability, it has become a favorite tool in my culinary arsenal. If you're in search of an affordable yet high-quality frying pan, I wholeheartedly recommend the Utopia Kitchen Frying Pan to elevate your cooking experience without burning a hole in your pocket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Nice for the price
reviews.reviewText: I needed new pans as mine have all seen better days and these fit into my budget. They are great pans they wipe clean easily and heat evenly. I hope to have them for a long time. And the three sizes are perfect for everyday use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value, plus quality
reviews.reviewText: I have not ordered this brand before but was really in need of new pans, especially for eggs. I was doing a lot of research and really didn't want to spend a lot for a small fry pan to make eggs. So I ordered this set and a set of 2 small non stick pots. I am very happy with the quality and the price!These are very well made and sturdy. Nice handles. I would recommend these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Extremely easy to clean. Nothing sticks to them. Cook on low to medium heat. I love these pans. I also have matching pots that are just as great. I highly recommend these. I use either wood utensils or silicone utensils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This set is great it cooks tremendously it cleans up so easy it doesn’t burn and the coating doesn’t cook away. This was a gift for my daughter and son-in-law and I had to go and buy me a set as well they are great and seems like they’re gonna last a long time great buy and affordable
Se calientan rápido, son fáciles de limpiar, funciona excelente con la estufa de inducción, buen producto, recomendado.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I had a very funny time with my daughter about these pans :)))). She told me that they are so beautiful that she does not dare to use them. I don't understand why this items has negative rewies , because they are extraordinary. I guess some customers leave such feedback out of malice. Too bad! I admit, I ordered them because I liked the color and it matches what I have in the kitchen, but now I am extremely satisfied with the quality. They were very well packaged, delivered quickly and even the man who delivered them to us, was amazing. So, 5 stars here on Amazon and 1000 in the sky for these products. Thanks!

We have received these pans, looks great, first try with the 2 largest pans, worked somewhat good, today used the smaller pans, nope, no induction much, and upon having a great look under, seems there is a curve and thus not conducting heat at best. very light products. will try again in a day or so and will compare with other brand, but so far not impressed with this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: No puedo estar más contento y satisfecho
reviews.reviewText: En serio que los sartenes son perfectos, son más de lo que esperaba. TRES sartenes por menos de 700 pesos, tres sartenes de calidad, bonitos y que tienen un antiadherente maravilloso. Sin duda volveré a comprarlos para regalarlos a mis familiares.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bottom is coming away.I’ve only had this pan 7 months and it is coming away at the bottom, this means it wobbles and doesn't lie straight which is really annoying. The second photo is one of the smaller pans which I have barely used and you can see the difference.When I first got the pan it was amazing and the non stick was the best I’ve seen but it doesn't take long to slowly fade away and now most things stick and you have to spend ages cleaning it when before you could either just wipe it or run water over and everything would come off.Very disappointed look elsewhere!
